Who am i?

Hi, I’m Nico, a 36-year-old from Germany with a passion for learning and self-improvement. While I currently work as an Office Manager at a small logistics company,
curiosity drives me to explore the world of IT and beyond. After facing and overcoming significant challenges that shaped nearly two decades of my life,
I am now dedicated to making the most of every opportunity.
This journey of discovery and growth is something I’m eager to document, both to reflect on my progress and inspire others who might be on similar paths.


What to expet from this website?


Hobbies and projects


from Creative endeavors to technical experiments, i'll documenting the projects that bring my interests to life


Learning journey


Follow my path as i work towards becoming a Certified Business Administrator and preapre to pursue a degree in Business informatics
i'll be sharing insights, challenges, and lessons learned along the way.


Vlogs and Personal Reflections


i hope to Experiment with vlogging and share a more dynamic and personal perspective on my journey
